thread.title: Clinton Tells Iowans That A GOP Return To The White House Would Damage The Economy
thread.title_full: Clinton Tells Iowans That A GOP Return To The White House Would Damage The Economy

author: Heather
title: Clinton Tells Iowans That A GOP Return To The White House Would Damage The Economy
text:
Bush-Reagan fatigue â€¢ 1 min ago 
As I am neither in prison or transgender, not sure how your hypothetical would apply to me. 
What you seem to avoid is the fact that those who are born with a body alien to their brain sex identification deserve to live as they identify. 
As for your rape scenario, that is another issue. And, it should be a huge issue. Rape is a crime, whether it happens on the street or in prison. In fact, prison is allegedly a climate controlled by society. So, why are we as a society not doing our jobs and preventing crime in prisons?
